nodes.text: A Bothan relay station was used as a waypoint for recruits hoping to join the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During the Galactic Civil War, the Alliance to Restore the Republic used the relay station in orbit of Bothawui as a rendezvous point. Raleigh Dawn, Sammie Staable, Raal Yorta, and Smileredon-Verdont were all led to the station by Tay Vanis.
